mapper.select: SELECT c.claim_no, status_code, type_code, request_code, cause_code, customer_blame, store_blame, partner_blame, mesh_blame, none_blame, creator, create_dt, updater, update_dt, order_id, claim_order_id, order_number, claim_order_number FROM claim c LEFT JOIN order_claim_relation r on c.claim_no = r.claim_no WHERE c.claim_no = #{id}
SELECT claim_description_no, order_id, claim_no, description, creator, create_dt FROM claim_description WHERE claim_no = #{claimNo} ORDER BY claim_description_no DESC LIMIT 30
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO claim_adjustment ( order_id, claim_no, adjustment_value, adjustment_type_code, delivery_fee_value, delivery_fee_type_code, cancel_fee_value, cancel_fee_type_code, creator, create_dt, updater, update_dt ) VALUE ( #{orderId}, #{claimNo}, #{adjustmentValue}, #{adjustmentTypeCode}, #{deliveryFeeValue}, #{deliveryFeeTypeCode}, #{cancelFeeValue}, #{cancelFeeTypeCode}, #{creator}, now(), #{updater}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT claim_adjustment_no, order_id, claim_no, adjustment_value, adjustment_type_code, delivery_fee_value, delivery_fee_type_code, cancel_fee_value, cancel_fee_type_code, creator, create_dt, updater, update_dt FROM claim_adjustment WHERE claim_no = #{claimNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO claim ( status_code, type_code, request_code, cause_code, customer_blame, store_blame, partner_blame, mesh_blame, none_blame, creator, create_dt, updater, update_dt ) VALUES ( #{claimInfo.statusCode}, #{claimInfo.typeCode}, #{claimInfo.requestCode}, #{claimInfo.causeCode}, #{claimInfo.customerBlame}, #{claimInfo.storeBlame}, #{claimInfo.partnerBlame}, #{claimInfo.meshBlame}, #{claimInfo.noneBlame}, #{creator}, now(), #{updater}, now() )
INSERT INTO claim_history ( claim_no, creator, create_dt, json_string ) VALUES ( #{claimNo}, #{creator}, NOW(), #{jsonString} )
mapper.select: SELECT claim_no, creator, create_dt, json_string FROM claim_history WHERE claim_no = #{claimNo} ORDER BY claim_history_no DESC

SELECT claim_adjustment_no, creator, create_dt, json_string FROM claim_adjustment_history WHERE claim_adjustment_no = (SELECT claim_adjustment_no FROM claim_adjustment WHERE claim_no = #{claimNo}) ORDER BY claim_adjustment_history_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE claim SET status_code = #{claimInfo.statusCode}, type_code = #{claimInfo.typeCode}, request_code = #{claimInfo.requestCode}, cause_code = #{claimInfo.causeCode}, customer_blame = #{claimInfo.customerBlame}, store_blame = #{claimInfo.storeBlame}, partner_blame = #{claimInfo.partnerBlame}, mesh_blame = #{claimInfo.meshBlame}, none_blame = #{claimInfo.noneBlame}, updater = #{updater}, update_dt = now() WHERE claim_no = #{claimInfo.claimNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_claim_relation ( order_id, claim_no, claim_order_id, order_number, claim_order_number ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{claimNo}, #{claimOrderId}, #{orderNumber}, #{claimOrderNumber} )
mapper.select: SELECT claim_no, order_id, claim_order_id, order_number, claim_order_number FROM order_claim_relation WHERE claim_no = #{claimNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO claim_description ( order_id, claim_no, description, creator, create_dt ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{claimNo}, #{description}, #{creator}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO claim_adjustment_history ( claim_adjustment_no, creator, create_dt, json_string ) VALUES ( #{claimAdjustmentNo}, #{creator}, now(), #{jsonString} )
mapper.update: UPDATE claim_adjustment SET order_id = #{orderId}, adjustment_value = #{adjustmentValue}, adjustment_type_code = #{adjustmentTypeCode}, delivery_fee_value = #{deliveryFeeValue}, delivery_fee_type_code = #{deliveryFeeTypeCode}, cancel_fee_value = #{cancelFeeValue}, cancel_fee_type_code = #{cancelFeeTypeCode}, updater = #{updater}, update_dt = now() WHERE claim_no = #{claimNo}
mapper.select: SELECT t2.code as parentCode, t2.code_name as parentCodeName, t3.code as childCode, t3.code_name as childCodeName FROM codes AS t1 LEFT JOIN codes AS t2 ON t2.parent_code_no = t1.code_no LEFT JOIN codes AS t3 ON t3.parent_code_no = t2.code_no LEFT JOIN codes AS t4 ON t4.parent_code_no = t3.code_no WHERE t1.code = 'CAUSE_TYPE'
SELECT code, code_name FROM codes WHERE parent_code_no = ( SELECT code_no FROM codes WHERE code = #{code}) ORDER BY display_order asc
